Name: El Especialista
Ingredients: 60 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: I love what the dry sherry adds to this Daiquiri, but given the addition of salt perhaps manzanilla sherry would have been more appropriate than fino? Remembering this is a Legacy competition cocktail, the "no garnish" seems a shame.
History: The Italian Bacardí Legacy 2016 winning cocktail created by Livio Morena at Caffè Propaganda in Rome.
